attributes.action: Cancel 2022 GCSE exams OR make them easier.
attributes.additional_details: Since the 2020 and 2021 exams were cancelled, it would be only fair as we have lost just as much learning as the others have if not even more.
attributes.background: Covid has severely affected many students learning as the quality of online learning compared to learning in school is very low. This has resulted in many students missing content or not learning the content as well as they should have.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
